youtube.title: How to Properly Cut Your Toenails to Avoid Ingrowns
youtube.description: Stop cutting your toenails in a curved shape! This video explains the biology of why straight-cut nails prevent painful ingrown toenails and infections. Learn the correct technique for foot health and hygiene. Subscribe for more biology and health tips!
